attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britannia has been a symbol of Englishness for hundreds of years, where is the need to remove this symbol? 
We have precious little of our heritage left as it is! 
What purpose would this serve other than easier transfer of our currency to the Euro.
We should resist this at all costs and retain as much our English identity as possible.
For far too long this government has ignored public opinion it is time to put a stop to this totaly unecessary interference and change for changes sake.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
